Package kdl.prox.dbvis

Interface Summary
ColorManagerInfo A means to communicate vertex coloring information to SubgraphJFrame.makeVertexPaintFunction().
ProxItemData Encapsulates Proximity data for all cases of vertex types - non-pseudo, pseudo-not-pager, and pseudo-and-pager.
RadiiInfo A means to communicate radii-drawing information to DBVisualizerJFrame.makeRadiiPaintable().
 

Class Summary
AttrListDialog A dialog that's used by DBVisualizerJFrame to let users specify attributes to use for the graph's elements' visual properties.
DBVisGraphMgr Class that uses JUNG (http://jung.sourceforge.net/) to support incremental exploratory visualization of a Proximity database.
DBVisualizerJFrame JFrame that allows browsing a Proximity database, starting with an object OID.
GraphAsTree Helper 'view' of an arbitrary graph as a tree.
GraphEdit Records changes to a Graph, i.e., Vertex and Edge instances added or removed.
LayoutStateTransitionFunction Supports layout animation via the creation of intermediate VertexLocationFunction instances, given start and end states.
LinearStateTransFcn A simple implementation of LayoutStateTransitionFunction that does linear interpolation between the start and end states.
PolarCoordinate A simple rho theta pair.
ProxDirectedSparseEdge Represents a Proximity link.
ProxItemDataImpl Delegate used by ProxSpaseVertex and ProxDirectedSparseEdge to store ProxItemData.
ProxSparseVertex Represents a Proximity object.
RadialLayoutHelper Static class that helps compute radial layout polar coordinates for Vertices, using the algorithm from this paper: Eades, P., "Drawing Free Trees," Bulletin of the Institute of Combinatorics and its Applications, pp.
